root.name: Sid Meier's Civilization III: Play the World
root.description: New CivilizationsArabia- Expansionist/Religious, Leader: Abu Bakr, Special Unit: Ansar Warrior (replaces Knight)Carthage- Commercial/Industrious, Leader: Hannibal Barca, Special Unit: Numidian Mercenary (replaces Spearman)Celts- Militaristic/Religious, Leader: Brennus, Special Unit: Gallic Swordsman (replaces Swordsman)Korea- Commercial/Scientific, Leader: Wang Kon, Special Unit: Hwach'a (replaces Cannon)Mongols- Expansionist/Militaristic, Leader: Temujin, Special Unit: Keshik (replaces Knight)Ottomans- Industrious/Scientific, Leader: Osman I, Special Unit: Sipahi (replaces Cavalry)Scandinavia- Expansionist/Militaristic, Leader: Ragnar Lodbrok, Special Unit: Berserker (replaces Longbowman)Spain- Commercial/Religious, Leader: Isabella I, Special Unit: Conquistador (replaces Explorer)
